channel.title: Exp Per Hit?

item.title: Exp Per Hit?
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

o alright thanks, so 120 is the exp and 240 is the hp to xp?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2009, 09:46:09 am[/size][hr]sory for double post so if i change it to

        TotalExp = (double)(2000*hitDiff);
        TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
      }
      TotalExp = (double)(2000*hitDiff);
      TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
      addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
      attackTimer = 7;

thats 2k exp per hit?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2009, 10:07:04 am[/size][hr][quote=“Digital Hotdogs, post:3, topic:256967”] TotalExp = (double)(240*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(120*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); attackTimer = 7;
Bottom of your code you got there.
(Double)(120hitDiff); is the EXP.
Aswell as the one ontop of that.
(ouble)(240hitDiff); is the EXP.[/quote]

dude that didnt work, i changed it to

[code]
double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double)(2000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(2000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(2000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(2000hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;

[code]

and it dosent work still, just hits normally any help?[/code][/code]

item.title: Exp Per Hit?
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

TotalExp = (double)(240*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(120*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); attackTimer = 7;
Bottom of your code you got there.
(Double)(120hitDiff); is the EXP.
Aswell as the one ontop of that.
(ouble)(240hitDiff); is the EXP.

item.title: Exp Per Hit?
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

Hey guys, i need some help on how to change the exp rate per hit i know its in client.java and i know its this code

    	double TotalExp = 0;
      if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
        TotalExp = (double)(480*hitDiff);
        TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
      } else if (FightType != 3) {
        TotalExp = (double)(240*hitDiff);
        TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
      } else {
        TotalExp = (double)(240*hitDiff);
        TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
        addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
      }
      TotalExp = (double)(120*hitDiff);
      TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate);
      addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
      attackTimer = 7;

But what to change i have no idea,

any help apreciated

thanks , lewis`

Read full topic
